You say you love us, but when it comes to voting, you don't. Is that really love?

We have 50K followers, but only 219 votes. I'm disappointed, shocked, and extremely worried.

In case you didn't know (or maybe you do), for the past 11 years, BusMap has entered over 100 competitions, both local and international, to win prizes to keep this app running for our 4.5 million users.

So this time, BusMap really needs your help! Please take a moment to vote for us in the I-STAR2024 Innovation and Startup Awards. The voting round ends on August 31, 2024. Give BusMap a helping hand!

Saigon Sniper was established in 2012 and is a pioneering unit in the socialization model of sports shooting in Ho Chi Minh City.

Saigon Sniper is not only a place to practice shooting skills but also a place to cultivate bravery, concentration, and discipline. Over more than 12 years of operation, Saigon Sniper has become a familiar destination for those who love this challenging sport.

BusMap is very happy to accompany partner Saigon Sniper, hoping everyone will have interesting experiences when trying out sports shooting. You can register and reserve your seat at the link below!

You say you love us, but when it comes to voting, you don't. Is that really love?

We have 50K followers, but only 219 votes. I'm disappointed, shocked, and extremely worried.

In case you didn't know (or maybe you do), for the past 11 years, BusMap has entered over 100 competitions, both local and international, to win prizes to keep this app running for our 4.5 million users.

So this time, BusMap really needs your help! Please take a moment to vote for us in the I-STAR2024 Innovation and Startup Awards. The voting round ends on August 31, 2024. Give BusMap a helping hand!

data.descriptionEn:
Saigon Sniper was established in 2012 and is a pioneering unit in the socialization model of sports shooting in Ho Chi Minh City.

Saigon Sniper is not only a place to practice shooting skills but also a place to cultivate bravery, concentration, and discipline. The club regularly organizes competitions to create a playground for students to interact, learn, and improve their skills. Over more than 12 years of operation, Saigon Sniper has become a familiar destination for those who love this challenging sport.

BusMap is very happy to accompany partner Saigon Sniper, hoping everyone will have interesting experiences when trying out sports shooting. You can register and reserve your seat at the link below!

Deadline: 17/07/2023.

CiC is an annual national startup innovation competition for students and students nationwide. The competition offers substantial cash prizes.

CiC consists of two categories:

Student Category: for students in grades 8 to 12.

Student Category: for college students, learners at educational institutions, and graduates within the past 12 months.

Register for CiC 2023

With the theme "Digital Innovation, Green Transformation," CiC 2023 promises an exciting journey, allowing you to unleash your creativity and transform your ideas into the market. See you at CiC 2023!"
